name: We're Watching Ewe
description: We're Watching Ewe is a project pitch to Aardman Animation in which we made a game using the Shaun the sheep IP. Purpose of the game is for the player to stealthily retrieve the flock whilst avoiding the pigs. As you gather more of the flock together it will be harder to hide. This provides a test for the player. Also we hope it appeals to the age range of 6-9 year old's, but there is no reason people older than that can’t play it. FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED!!!!!!!
